title: AI Logic: Add original Grok/ChatGPT-vibe branding images and wire them into the UI

requirements.summary: Add original, minimal, high-contrast AI Logic branding images (logo mark, favicon, hero background) with a modern AI-assistant aesthetic while remaining clearly non-derivative.
acceptanceCriteria: New images are generated as specified in imageRequirements.required
The visuals feel consistent with a modern AI-chat brand (minimal, premium, subtle gradients) while remaining clearly original (not a copy of Grok/ChatGPT marks)

file_operations.description: Add the generated original AI Logic logo mark image (minimal abstract mark, subtle gradient on dark background). Ensure it is clearly original and not a copy/trace of any protected Grok AI or ChatGPT logo/wordmark.
Add the generated original AI Logic favicon image (simplified monochrome/duotone mark). Ensure it is clearly original and not a copy/trace of any protected Grok AI or ChatGPT logo/wordmark.

Add the generated original wide hero/header background image (soft gradient + light noise texture, no text). Ensure it is clearly original and not a copy/trace of any protected Grok AI or ChatGPT assets.

requirements.summary: Wire the generated branding images into the app UI as static assets: replace the header bot icon with the new logo mark and set the favicon in the HTML head.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames from imageRequirements.required
The header in frontend/src/App.tsx displays the new logo image instead of the lucide Bot icon (layout remains aligned and sized appropriately)
frontend/index.html includes a favicon <link> referencing the generated favicon file
No backend changes are required for image rendering

file_operations.description: Replace the current header lucide Bot icon with an rendering the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-logic-logo.dim_512x512.png, keeping sizing/alignment consistent with the existing header layout. Optionally incorporate frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-logic-hero.dim_1600x400.png as a subtle decorative background for the existing header area without adding new routes or backend involvement.

Add/update favicon metadata in the <head> to reference the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/ai-logic-favicon.dim_32x32.png (served from the public directory). Ensure no backend routing is introduced for image delivery.

requirements.summary: Keep branding updates aligned with existing Tailwind theme tokens and avoid introducing a new blue/purple-dominant global palette.
acceptanceCriteria: UI continues using existing CSS variables / Tailwind tokens for colors
No new global theme changes that shift the app into a blue/purple-dominant look

file_operations.description: Ensure any styling changes made for the new logo/hero usage rely on existing Tailwind classes and theme tokens (e.g., bg-background, bg-card, border-border) and do not introduce new global color definitions or a blue/purple-dominant aesthetic. Avoid edits to immutable hook paths and avoid adding new global theme configuration.
